question_sentence: Skies across the Northern Hemisphere lit up with shooting stars as a result of what meteor shower?
evidence: The Perseid meteor shower is a celestial event caused by debris from the comet Swift–Tuttle, and can be seen for around a month every year, peaking in mid-August when dozens of shooting stars can be seen racing across the night sky.

question_sentence: What recent discovery on Mars has sparked excitement among scientists about the possibility of life on the Red Planet?
evidence: A recent study using seismic data from Nasa's InSight lander suggests that water may be trapped in rocks up to 12 miles below the surface of Mars. These findings likely indicate remnants of ancient lakes, rivers and oceans that existed on Mars 3 million years ago.

question_sentence: Crowds at the Paris Olympics closing ceremony were serenaded by a set from which French musical act?
evidence: The indie band behind the hits "1901" and "Lisztomania" were joined by fellow Gallic rockers Air before handing over to Los Angeles for a medley of hits performed by the Red Hot Chili Peppers, Billie Eilish, and Snoop Dogg and Dr Dre.

question_sentence: Why has Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida announced he will not run for a second term?
choices: To run for a different political office
evidence: Kishida has decided to step down, clearing the way for a new leader this autumn. His decision comes after declining poll numbers and scandals involving his Liberal Democratic Party's unrecorded political donations and connections to the controversial Unification Church.

question_sentence: Around 30,000 Serbians took to the streets to protest against plans to mine what mineral?
evidence: The Serbian government granted Rio Tinto a licence to begin work on a huge mining project to extract lithium in the western Jadar valley, one of Europe's largest reserves of the mineral. Lithium is a crucial component in batteries for electric vehicles and Europe is keen to reduce its reliance on Chinese manufacturers.

question_sentence: A prominent US union has filed an unfair labour practice charge against which two public figures?
evidence: The United Auto Workers have accused Trump and Musk of attempting to intimidate workers during an interview on X. The National Labor Relations Board will investigate the allegations, which could result in legal action.

question_sentence: Graffiti artist Banksy has been at it again, leaving nine murals across London in as many days. What animal did the final artwork depict?
evidence: On Tuesday, Banksy claimed a mural that had appeared on the shutters of London Zoo, depicting a gorilla forcing open the bars to free the animals, was by him. It was the ninth and – according to Banksy insiders – final artwork in a series that has kept Londoners entertained in recent days.

question_sentence: Spain is investigating which pop star for allegedly shooting a music video in an unauthorised area?
evidence: The Balearic Islands environmental agency claimed that the pop star filmed scenes for her "Lifetimes" music video on protected dunes on S'Espalmador. A spokesperson for Perry said that she had received "verbal authority" for the shoot.

question_sentence: The UK Health Security Agency has warned that rates of which sexually transmitted infection have reached an all-time high?
evidence: Data showed 85,223 cases of the disease were diagnosed in England in 2023 – the highest number since records began in 1918. Gonorrhoea is ordinarily treated with an antibiotic called ceftriaxone, but experts have observed that the disease appears to be becoming more resistant to the drug, creating what is termed "super-gonorrhoea".

question_sentence: A team of geologists recently discovered that the Altar Stone at Stonehenge was transported from which location?
evidence: Stonehenge's Altar Stone, once thought to have come from Wales, was actually transported over 450 miles from northeast Scotland. The finding suggests that Neolithic Britain was more advanced than previously believed.

question_sentence: The Paris Olympic Games are over but the 2028 Olympics are already taking shape in which city?
evidence: After an exciting two-and-a-half weeks of competition, the Paris Olympics recently wrapped up with a grand closing ceremony at the Stade de France. It was a fitting Hollywood finish as the Games were formally handed to 2028 host Los Angeles.

question_sentence: Which hurricane knocked out power to half of Puerto Rico this week?
evidence: Hurricane Ernesto thrashed Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands this week, leaving hundreds of thousands of people without power.

question_sentence: Which university announced its president will step down months after student-led demonstrations rocked the campus?
evidence: Columbia University President Minouche Shafik is stepping down after protests over the Israel-Hamas war gripped the campus and spread to colleges across the country. Her announcement was shocking, not because it was unexpected, but rather because she survived in her role for months amid mounting pressure to resign.

question_sentence: Which virus was declared a global health emergency this week?
evidence: The World Health Organization on Wednesday declared the ongoing mpox outbreak in Africa a global health emergency. This comes after a strain of mpox — formerly known as monkeypox — reached four more countries in Africa after previously being contained to the Democratic Republic of Congo.

question_sentence: Which company announced it has hired its fourth CEO in just two years?
evidence: Starbucks has tapped Chipotle CEO Brian Niccol to be its new chairman and CEO as the coffee chain struggles with sinking sales.

question_sentence: President Joe Biden made a major funding announcement this week as part of an effort to advance which cause?
evidence: President Joe Biden this week highlighted $150 million in new research awards to eight organizations seeking to advance cancer studies. The “Cancer Moonshot” program that Biden founded as vice president aims to halve the number of cancer deaths in the coming decades.

question_sentence: Which NFL team became the first franchise to be valued at over $10 billion?
evidence: Dallas Cowboys owner Jerry Jones purchased “America’s Team” in 1989 for an estimated $140 million and has turned the organization into a financial powerhouse. It is now the first professional sports team to be valued at over $10 billion, according to rankings released on Tuesday.

question_sentence: Why did authorities order evacuations this week near the Greek capital Athens?
evidence: Fast-spreading wildfires tore through several neighborhoods close to Athens, triggering a multi-pronged rescue effort coordinated with European allies.

question_sentence: Which singer recently criticized former President Donald Trump's campaign for its unauthorized use of her music?
evidence: Singer Celine Dion shared a cheeky statement after learning the Trump campaign has used her ballad "My Heart Will Go On" at multiple rallies.

question_sentence: Which international airport unveiled a new main terminal that will feature appearances by therapy llamas?
evidence: Portland International Airport reopened a main terminal on Wednesday that is inspired by nature. It will feature appearances by “therapy” llamas and alpacas to help relax frazzled flyers, airport officials said.

question_sentence: According to the Farmers’ Almanac, what type of winter weather is Delaware expected to experience in the 2024-2025 season?
For the first time, which team won the National Lifeguard Championship in 2024?
What was the estimated damage caused by the fire at the Southgate Apartments in Newark, Delaware?
What new service is American Airlines introducing at Wilmington Airport (ILG) starting in October 2024?
choices: Luxury motorcoach service to Philadelphia International Airport (PHL)
Helicopter transfers to New York City
High-speed train service to Washington, D.C.

question_sentence: What is the primary goal of Futures First Gaming in Wilmington, Delaware?
choices: To provide gamers with opportunities to earn college credits and prepare for STEM careers
To create a social media platform for gamers

question_sentence: What role is Elijah Sessoms expected to play for the Delaware Blue Hens in the upcoming season?
Who is the new operator of The Brandywine Restaurant in Wilmington?
Who was appointed as the interim superintendent of the Christina School District?
What is the official state cocktail of Delaware as of August 2024?
When will Delaware begin accepting applications for its recreational marijuana program?
